Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant was denied procedural fairness and whether the officer erred in determining eligibility under IRPR
Procedural_Context: Judicial review of administrative immigration decision
Basis_of_Claim: Alleged denial of procedural fairness and incorrect application of eligibility criteria
Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness for substantive assessment, correctness for procedural fairness
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to submit updated proof of funds by deadline after family size increased
Application_Error: Officer issued decision one day before deadline, premature but inconsequential
Review_Outcome: No breach of procedural fairness; decision upheld as reasonable
Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to officer's decision
Application_Factor: Requirement to demonstrate sufficient funds under IRPR
Decision_Outcome: Immigration application denied due to lack of required documentation
Decision_Review_Issue: Procedural fairness and reasonableness of refusal
Standard_of_Review: Correctness for procedural fairness, reasonableness for eligibility determination
Outcome_of_Review: Judicial review dismissed; no question certified
Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant failed to provide updated proof of funds after increase in family size
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to submit evidence by deadline despite two requests
Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; premature decision did not affect outcome
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim of procedural unfairness and error in eligibility assessment
Procedural_Issue: Timing of decision relative to deadline and adequacy of notice
Omission_Type: Failure to provide required updated financial documentation
